DOC.brief_summary: The purpose research measure daytime open-eye response wear narafilcon B lenses .
DOC.brief_title: Daytime Corneal Swelling During Wear Narafilcon B Lenses
DOC.criteria: Be legal age ( i.e . â‰¥ 18 year ) . Be mentally competent , willing able sign write informed consent form . Have contact lens distance sphere requirement range 1.00D 6.00D . Have spectacle astigmatism < 1.25D eye . Currently wear soft contact lens ( least 6 month prior trial ) documentation current prescription . Have normal eye evidence abnormality disease . For purpose study normal eye define one : ) evidence lid abnormality infection ; ii ) conjunctival abnormality infection ; iii ) clinically significant slit lamp finding ( i.e , edema , stain , scar , vascularization , infiltrate abnormal opacity ) ; iv ) active ocular disease . Required concurrent ocular medication . Any systemic illness would contraindicate lens wear medical treatment would affect vision successful lens wear . Eye injury surgery within eight week immediately prior enrollment study . Abnormal lacrimal secretion . Preexisting ocular irritation would preclude contact lens fit . Keratoconus corneal irregularity . Pregnancy , lactate plan pregnancy time enrollment . Participation concurrent clinical trial .
